scancerrna.description: Non-coding RNA biomarkers for human cancers, including lncRNAs, miRNAs, piRNAs, snoRNAs, and circRNAs, curated from published literature to facilitate diagnostic, clinical, and therapeutic applications.
scancerrna.name: SCancerRNA: Expression in cell level and interaction resource of non-coding RNA biomarkers for cancers

publications.title: SCancerRNA: Expression at the Single-cell Level and Interaction Resource of Non-coding RNA Biomarkers for Cancers.
